content: The IG publisher documentation indicates that it may create the Jira spec .xml file under the build directory to add to the Jira spec artifacts project. I found the generated xslt file to looks to produce the xml file in build/template/scripts/onGenerate.jira.xslt. Where can I find the generated .xml file under the build directory?
Thanks Jose! Is there a setting I need to enable on the publisher? I'm not seeing a jira.tmp2.xml file.
(maybe I'm wrong in the file name)
The file should be generated in your root IG folder - and should have the same filename as what you'd be expected to commit. E.g. FHIR-uv-somecode.xml
